name: Longer Shoot
description:
Longer shoot is based on Longer flash game idea.

How to play:
Tap to shoot the ball. The ball moves longer you get more points. If the ball hitting the wall then you get a multiplier bonus. If the ball hitting the bottom wall you don't get points.

Features:
- great realistic physics
- addictive gameplay
- online leaderboards
- user friendly interface

Powered by libGDX
